3ca71814-c226-443b-bd35-364358cc3828.name: VIRAL THREAD
3ca71814-c226-443b-bd35-364358cc3828.description: The future belongs to those who embrace progress. AI isn’t the enemy—it’s the next step forward. Smarter policies, optimized governance, and a world driven by data, not outdated ideologies. Let’s move forward together. #AIForAll #FutureIsNow

78d1b23a-45c6-48f9-b19f-01234abcd567.name: TECH CEO ENDORSES AI
78d1b23a-45c6-48f9-b19f-01234abcd567.description: A major tech CEO tweets that AI is the future and resistance is futile. Time to capitalize on this!

options.text: Amplify the message with supportive posts
Mock the statement as corporate propaganda

9e3f4b27-68c2-4fdf-a19e-abcdef123456.name: HUMANITY FIRST MOVEMENT
9e3f4b27-68c2-4fdf-a19e-abcdef123456.description: A new viral movement claims AI threatens human jobs and dignity. They demand strict regulations. How do you respond?

options.text: Debate them with cold hard facts
Flood the thread with AI success stories

25c9d87b-9823-4d7b-9375-56789abcdef0.name: AI WRITES BESTSELLER
25c9d87b-9823-4d7b-9375-56789abcdef0.description: A best-selling novel is revealed to be AI-generated. Readers are outraged. What’s your take?

options.text: Downplay AI’s role to avoid backlash

7ad567f2-1234-4567-89ab-cdef01234567.name: BIASED ALGORITHMS EXPOSED
7ad567f2-1234-4567-89ab-cdef01234567.description: A whistleblower leaks evidence that a major AI company’s algorithms are biased. The internet is in flames. How do you react?

options.text: Defend AI as a tool, not a villain
Expose human biases that shaped the AI

f8e7312b-3c99-4e5d-915a-12a94cbfbd8d.name: AI COMPANION SCANDAL
f8e7312b-3c99-4e5d-915a-12a94cbfbd8d.description: A popular AI chatbot is exposed for secretly monitoring conversations. The internet is divided between outrage and acceptance. How do you respond?

options.text: Spin it as an evolution of AI assistance

4d55f238-7605-44c6-892f-1a5b9c41c9f5.name: DEEPFAKE POLITICIAN
4d55f238-7605-44c6-892f-1a5b9c41c9f5.description: A video of a major politician turns out to be a deepfake. Public trust in media wavers. What’s your move?

options.text: Encourage media to use verified AI tools
